meanings: impoverishment, exhaustion, poverty, 피폐하다 become impoverished[exhausted], become poor

meanings.meaning: a country ravaged by civil war

vlive.korean: 피폐한 생각들을 모조리 튀긴다. and my impoverished thoughts. 듣기 View video MAMAMOO : [MMMTV4] EP15 옥탑방 마마무 PART 1
굉장히 정신적으로 피폐해진 그런 역할입니다. My character was devastated emotionally. 듣기 View video V MOVIE : [Replay] <럭키> 무비토크 라이브 ' MovieTalk Live'
그동안 심신이 피폐해진 우리 OH MY GIRL 여러분들! Your mind and body got tired in the past, OH MY GIRL! 듣기 View video OH MY GIRL : 찾았다! 오마이걸 제5화: 떠나라오마이걸
vlive.english: Your mind and body got tired in the past, OH MY GIRL!

examples.korean: a country ravaged by civil war 발음듣기 내전으로 피폐해진 나라 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: a country ravaged by civil war 발음

examples.korean: The country was devastated by constant warfare. 발음듣기 계속된 전쟁으로 국토가 피폐해졌다 Neungyule
examples.english: The country was devastated by constant warfare. 발음

examples.korean: The people are becoming exhausted by the continuing recession[economic stagnation]. 발음듣기 계속되는 경기 침체로 국민들의 삶이 피폐해져 가고 있다 Neungyule
examples.english: The people are becoming exhausted by the continuing recession[economic stagnation]. 발음

examples.korean: The long civil war has left the country incredibly poor, while its citizens do not even have basic health care. 발음듣기 오랜 내전으로 인해 남수단의 경제는 피폐해졌고 시민들은 기초 의료 서비스도 받지 못하는 상태이다. Neungyule
examples.english: The long civil war has left the country incredibly poor, while its citizens do not even have basic health care. 발음

examples.korean: Medical professionals leave impoverished rural areas. 발음듣기 의사들은 시골지역을 더 피폐하고 만들고 있습니다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Medical professionals leave impoverished rural areas. 발음
